properties.address: Bethel Presbyterian Church, Wrexham, Clwyd LL11 2ST
properties.description: We set up our warm space in January 2023, on average we have 18 attendees of varying ages. Activities include a magazine 'read and return', knitting materials, craft, games and puzzles. Our space is run by three volunteers each week and we welcome anyone who wishes to spend time in a safe, nurturing and friendly environment. There is a charging point with USB and plug sockets. Bottomless hot and cold drinks with homemade cakes, scones and other snacks.
properties.title: Bethel Welcome Wednesday
